title: FunctionTypeValidator

CommentComponent(kind=text, text=Validator for a , value=) CommentComponent(kind=typeName, text=FunctionType, value=kwasm.ast.type.FunctionType) CommentComponent(kind=text, text= node.

From the docs:

Function types may not specify more than one result.


[tn^1] => [tm^2]
  • The arity m must not be larger than 1.
  • Then the function type is valid.
, value=null)
